title: Full Size Wallpaper of Champion Splash Arts can be found where?
body: I'm looking for the full size champion splash arts on the riot website and I can't find them. Please respond with either a link as to where they are or directions on how to get them. Also looking for the multiple skins of the Champions as well.

replies.body:
You can find all the artwork we offer on the League site from [this page.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/media/art)

I hope this helps, let me know if you have any questions!
Thank you. This was exactly what I was looking for.
